sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMBERVILLERS, a large market-town of France, in the department of the Vosges, and the arrondissement of Epinal. It stands on a mountain, at the foot of which runs the river Mortagne. It has a considerable number of iron forges in the vicinity, and much woollen and linen cloth is manufactured ; and there are mills for making paper. In 1836 its population amounted to 4990. Long. 7. 5. 18. E. Lat. 48. 20. 43. N.
